name: Impossible Tracks - Car stunts and fast Driving 3D
name_original: Impossible Tracks - Car stunts and fast Driving 3D
description:
Do you think you are brave enough to take the challenges on fast n furious extreme impossible tracks for performing car stunts and trained enough to master it? You must try to check either you can survive while performing extreme car stunts on impossible paths or you die in few seconds.
The crazy, challenging and furious car fantasy stunts on extreme impossible tracks will blow your mind. Extreme stunt hurdles environment make this game highly challenging and addictive. Take fast and furious high jumps on huge container ramps; accelerate through metallic containers.
This Impossible track: stunning stunts game is jam-packed with, drift, extreme stunts, mid-air jumps, container jumps, real time car driving and much more. Show your stunt driving skills on impossible tracks and race with yourself. Get yourself ready to perform amazing car stunts on metallic container ramps forming impossible tracks.
Impossible tracks-stunt car: contains genuine physics engine based cars and challenging stunt missions that will make it more adventurous and addictive game. The wonderful and luxurious car stunt simulator provides you tons of exciting levels with great interior feels and amusing. This modern car stunt and drag racing game in impossible tracks filled with full action and free style stunt driving on container ramps.
You can use all three steering controls including button controls, tilt controls and steer wheel controls for handling your car. A car stunt on impossible tracks is really a breath taking game. You have to be very cautious and careful while driving as your one mistake can end the game.
Features of Impossible Tracks
• Day and Night mode
• Multiple luxurious cars
• Multiple challenging missions
• Real Physics controls on all cars
• Control settings i.e. steering, tilt and button controls
• Different luxurious cars can be purchased.
• Precise Driving
• Offline game play
• Real 3D environment
• HD graphics
• Amusing sounds

It is highly addictive game for car stunt gamers. Just download it now and enjoy this highly challenging and addictive game.
